Further investigation points to: https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/src/8d1ccfd9c5a0bf1a662bd0fe35858f4e527d2bac/Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/Half.h?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Half.h-516
//static const int max_digits10 = ; Mac is missing the definition for it - hence the compilation error.
@ggael / @benoitsteiner why is that commented out? Could we simply set max_digits10 to 5? (Based on IEEE 754)
